structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.catch_line: Bonds to be paid from bridge revenues only.

text.section: The principal and interest on the bonds shall be payable solely from the special fund provided for their payment.
The bonds shall contain a statement on their face that the city shall not be obligated to pay the principal or interest thereon except from the revenues of the bridge.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-17.
